trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around July 8th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking home from a friends house. Then I just happened to be looking at the sky and i saw a blue white diamond shape over my neighbors house. I was very young so I didn't know what to make of it I just stood there scared to death. it was a blue white glowing diamond just hovering there. After maybe a minute I recovered and ran inside then after 2 minutes of being inside i looked out the window and it was gone.
Summary: a blue diamond over my neighbors house when i ran inside i looked out the window it was gone
